message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I need to make a profit. I can do $105, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit shy of my budget. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can we meet in the middle?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not quite willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $108, and that's as close to the middle as I can get without losing money.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $102 for the product. Can we get closer to my budget?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway from there, so I'll do $107.50
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
